0: Last time I stayed I received an upgrade and this time I stayed in a standard room I enjoyed both
I just got back from a long weekend at Epic and it was hands down one of the best hotels I have ever stayed at
We had a suite with a great balcony
I recommend this hotel and will stay here again in the future
It was the fastest pedicure I have ever had and she did a good job but I am paying for the experience being pampered friendly service etc

Btw there is a great French cafe about three mins walk away just past the CVS pharmacy that offers great breakfasts and lunches called Cafe Bastille their steak and eggs their waffles etc are delicious and you can keep your costs down a bit
beautiful view clean luxury and well wort the price wonderful bath and showerno coffee in room no vending machines on floors no understanding of room cooling system
From the meeting rooms to the meals to our accommodations everything exceeded our expectations
Had some nice desserts and coffee as well
When we walked in we were immediately escorted to the concierge level
1: I have known Juan since I began staying in the hotel
We did the valet parking and we took our luggage to the hotel the hotel looks pretty cool and busy
The lady at the front desk offer me one even tho I missed it
The place is in the business district but Zuma makes everything good
Most of the time I stay at the Four Seasons on Brickel and sometimes at the Conrad Hotel but this time my assistant recommended that I stay at the Epic
I am in love with the entire room
coffee and tea free flowing in lobby every morning
Hotel was nice but I was put in a room next to renovations and right over outside Area 31 bar that begins from 4 pm to 11 pm with loud music and lively scene outdoors as close to pool
Overall meh to disappointing facility but exceptional staff
2: Room was weird with open bathroom and shower layout
The rooms have detoriated over the past five years with stains on furniture and also walls
They gave me a phone charger
Finally and this mattered to me b c I had intended to use lobby seating space to meet w clients there was not very quiet music piped into the main lobby seating area 24 hrs day
Magnifier inserts in the bathroom mirrors that did not work
It truly was a perfect stay that I wish I did not have to leave
I ’m confused as to why this hotel has such high ratings
There were a couple of issues with our room the sliding door was stuck the bathroom vanity lights blew out and the room was not immaculately clean
Looks like the hotel is saving money for their renovations
